profile.name: Muhammad Khizar Bajwa
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer – .NET Full Stack Developer
profile.summary: Full-Stack Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience delivering scalable web and enterprise applications using ASP.NET, .NET Core, Angular, and modern DevOps practices. Proven success designing end-to-end solutions across finance, ERP, and analytics domains, with hands-on leadership in monolithic, n-layered, and microservices architectures. Skilled in RESTful APIs, SQL performance tuning, and cloud-native development using Jenkins, Docker, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines.

projects.name: Feedback through Facial Expression
projects.description: Built a real-time feedback system using facial emotion recognition. Trained classifiers on 13,000+ labeled images using SVM and statistical models in R.

projects.name: Teaching Assistant - Python
projects.description: Mentored 60+ students across two semesters in introductory Python courses. Helped students debug assignments and understand core programming concepts.

responsibilities: Developed a Warehouse Management System using ASP.NET Core and Angular.
Built a Patient Management Portal for a clinic.
Engineered a Payroll & Role-Based Access System.
Created a Remote Desktop Monitoring Tool in Python.

Designed a Configuration Management Portal.
Developed Data Scraping Pipelines for chemical inventory reporting.
Compiled a Legal Services Directory by scraping multiple sources.
Identified and remediated vulnerabilities flagged by Rapid7 and Veracode.
Maintained and modernized the GfK Shopper Insight platform.
Migrated modules from legacy ASP.NET to ASP.NET Core.
Integrated charts and dashboards for analytics teams.
Rewrote slow-performing queries and APIs.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices.
Designed and maintained modules for a digital currency exchange platform.
Upgraded systems to .NET Core microservices.
Integrated RabbitMQ message queues.
Developed secure KYC onboarding module.
Optimized SEO and page speed for public sites.
Developed and maintained modules for an Online Accounting ERP system.
Implemented microservices architecture with CQRS and RabbitMQ.
Created RESTful APIs and reusable UI components.
Optimized data layer performance and reporting.
Developed modules for an in-house ERP system.
Designed web interfaces using Razor and Bootstrap.
Maintained customer, vendor, and employee portals.
Wrote SQL queries, stored procedures, and triggers.
